user-whoarewe-description:
Published by Édifice, {{appName}} is the mobile application of the first collaborative network designed especially for schools. It simplifies the life of teachers by offering a secure tool to better communicate with families.

At Édifice, we think of digital technologies as a key ally for dynamic school. While placing the student at the heart of it all, the broader educational community finds its place and actively engages in the education of the younger generations.
